title: Literatuur magazine nr. 7 Engelse editie Roald Dahl
description: Contains:Short stories from Someone like you (1953):* Taste* Lamb to the Slaughter* Man from the South* The Soldier* My Lady Love, My Dove* Dip in the Pool* Galloping Foxley* Skin* Poison* The Wish* Neck* The Sound Machine* Nunc Dimittis* The Great Automatic GrammatizatorShort stories from Over to You (1946):* Death of an Old Man* An African Story* A Piece of Cake* Katina* Yesterday was Beautiful* They Shall Not Grow Old* Beware of the Dog* Only This
author: Roald Dahl
